Job Description:
We are looking for a Business Data Analyst I in support of a DLA contract in which the candidate will work in Philadelphia, PA. This position is contingent upon contract award.
The candidate will perform the following functions:
Provides support in collecting and organizing information required for preparation of user manuals, training materials, installation guides, proposals, and reports
Edits functional descriptions, system specifications, user manuals, special reports, or any other customer deliverables and documents.
Provides support in performing financial and administrative tasks
Under general supervision, is responsible for preparing and/or maintaining systems, programming, and operations documentation, procedures and methods.
Maintains a current internal documentation library
Provides or coordinates special documentation services as required

Job Requirements:
  • Should have experience in working with: DOD Lifecycle management, DOD 5000.1, 5000.2, DODI 5000.02, and Guidebook
  • Two (2) years' experience in similar taskings
  • Specialized experience in assembling technical documents and providing detailed analysis of various business system functions
  • Must possess IT-III security clearance or have a current National Agency Check with written Inquiries (NACI) at time of proposal submission
  • Must have project management experience
  • Must have experience with the following programs: MS Suite Word Excel Access Power Point
